DOC.brief_summary: Aim of this randomized clinical trial is to examine the treatment effectiveness of an acupuncture protocol in adult patients with non chronified TMDs.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Efficiency of Acupuncture in Non Chronified Pain Patients With TMDs
DOC.detailed_description: Therefore there are two treatment arms, acupuncture verum and acupuncture placebo. Investigators will evaluate for 4 weeks primary current pain, secondary the unassisted jaw opening.
DOC.criteria: non chronified TMD pain written informed consent dysfunctional TMD pain systematic diseases affecting the joints or pain perception pregnancy needle phobia
